name: The Passage Of Time
description:
Immerse yourself in a world where every second is important, fight against opponents, upgrade your character and be ready to face horror when time runs out. Will you be on time?

Gameplay

The game sends you to randomly generated caves with a wide variety of paths, which is filled with monsters and creepy creatures.


You will have to make buildings, scaffolding or use special tools to get to the most inaccessible and dark corners of the dungeons. Unique events, objects and plants awaiting you in caves, will be useful for creating powerful weapons necessary for survival.

You do not have to start the game over again as is customary in classic roguelike, after your death you will be transported back to the time where you will continue your journey. But be careful, returning to the past, the present will be lost forever.
